alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:08PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lemhi and south central Ravalli Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Gibbonsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Anyone recreating in the area of Lost Trail Pass should seek shelter. Locations impacted include... Lost Trail Pass. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 0 and 2, and near mile marker 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
